title: Need 4 People (any rank i dont mind) To play Ranked Team for Ward Skin!
body:
If you're interested PM me through League and once we have a team of 5 just play (hopefully to win) but wouldnt mind just playing for fun plus i have a slight obsession with Skins :D 

My Main Role: Support 
Rank: S IV

Need a Good ADC, Tanky Top, Burst mid and good ganker JG 

**AGAIN** This is **TEAM** Ranked not duos 

Thanks :)

replies.body:
**UPDATE** Since ive been flooded with Friend Requests (Literally) I will be making more teams and we can try juggle usage? 

Now if you join by all means play with/without me etc you can still host im pretty sure. 

I've made 2 teams Inbox me wethier you're interested .. i cant remember everyone usernames i have over 200+ people on my account  xD

i might even create a teamspeak or discord group chat

I Am Teddy West
ADC
Silver

Add me
I'm down. My in game is MrCube
Okay Guys Team has 8 People Dont need more 5 on 3 reserves i guess :D
